properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 8:01PM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below
zero.

* WHERE...Buffalo County.

* WHEN...Until noon CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing and drifting snow will
persist for a few more hours. Travel conditions will continue
to improve this evening as winds diminish.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY
